name: Aaditya Vijay Hirurkar

experience.title: Senior Business Analyst / Sr. Technical Business Analyst
experience.description: Responsible for requirement gathering/analysis, release and product management, and vendor coordination. Involved in banking domain projects including Online Banking India (Finacle Ebanking by Infosys), Retail Internet Banking, and UK/Germany/Canada service requests. Led tasks such as BRS/feasibility analysis, UAT planning, and deployment; acted as Application Owner for multiple geographies; contributed to project documentation, testing, and live issue resolution; supported pre-sales and cloud-based initiatives (WSFA).

experience.title: Software Implementation Engineer
experience.description: Implemented WSFA (web-based SFA) solution and customized CRM/workflow applications for clients such as Novartis India Ltd., Franco Indian Pharmaceuticals, and Alkem Labs. Roles included client communication, URS/SRS documentation, UI design, test planning, on-site deployments, training, and go-live. Technical duties encompassed server/database setup (Windows/Linux), app server configuration (Jboss/Tomcat), and software deployments with version control.

certifications: Yes+ course with advanced meditation techniques
Information Security training: Web/Mobile application threats
